name: Void Chaser
description:
In Void Chaser, embark on a frantic and endless run in a futuristic setting where you have to make quick decisions, and have quick reflexes, in order to reach for a big score. Jump over void spaces, avoid asteroids and get items to help your run last the most!

> Main features/characteristics:
- Infinite map with increasing difficulty;
- Side movement (5 rows) and jump;
- Score attack;
- Three lives per run;
- Items to catch (such as extra lives and temporary powerups);
- Randomly-spawned asteroids that you must avoid;
- Hi-Score autosaving.
